    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Media Industries &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Sep 10, 2014
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/mediaindustries
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">
      <span class="iprint">
       <a href="/print_content.php?pid=564344&amp;sid=4651912&amp;mode=g" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>
     <span class="rssupdatelink" style="padding:0px 10px; border-left:dotted thin #666666;">
      <span class="irss">
       <a href="#" onclick="return showDlg('RSS Updates','/process_content.php?m=rssupdates&amp;iid=3322&amp;pid=564344&amp;sid=4651912&amp;gid=0&amp;uid=63913',0)" title="Subscribe to Updates via RSS">
        RSS Updates
       </a>

            </div>
           </td>

             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17115744">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17115744">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17115744">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17115744">
          <p>
           <strong>
            Trade Magazines
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
            Academic Search Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           This database contains a number of useful trade publications, but no easy way to limit to only those sources. Narrow results by Source Type to Magazines on the left sidebar of your results list to begin the weeding process.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bsh">
            Business Source Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           Note that there are limit options on the left sidebar of your results list, including the option to Narrow Results by Source Type: Trade Publications.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh">
            Communication and Mass Media Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           To narrow results to trade magazines, from the main search screen, select "trade publication" in the "publication type" menu.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-www.lexisnexis.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/us/lnacademic">
            LexisNexis Academic
           </a>
           <br />
           To search only trade publications, choose the Advanced Search link in the News box.&nbsp; Then choose "industry news publications" in the "by type" menu in the "select source" box.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;" align="left">
           <em>
            <strong>
             **If you're not sure if a source you found is from a trade magazine or not, check the Ulrichs' Periodicals Directory.
            </strong>
           </em>
           <br />
           To access Ulrich's, go directly to
           <a href="http://0-ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/">
            http://0-ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/
           </a>
           (or search for Ulrich's Periodicals Directory in the library catalog). Enter the name of a magazine (e.g.,
           <em>
            Advertising Age
           </em>
           ,
           <em>
            USA Today
           </em>
           ). Select the name of the magazine from the results list. In the Basic Description section of the magazine's record, there's a "content type" field.&nbsp; If it says "trade," it's meant for an industry audience and is the appropriate type of publication for this assignment.&nbsp; If it says "consumer" (as in the case of USA Today, for example), it's meant for a general audience&nbsp;and isn't appropriate.
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Scholarly Journals
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
            Academic Search Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bsh">
            Business Source Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           Largely full text database of scholarly and trade journals covering all aspects of accounting, business, and economics.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh">
            Communication and Mass Media Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           Scholarly journals, trade journals, and monographs in the areas of communication and mass media.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://0-online.sagepub.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/cgi/search">
            Sage Journals Online
           </a>
           <br />
           Full-text access to over 500 journals published by Sage, providing wide coverage of scholarly publications in all disciplines, but particularly the social sciences.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17115744" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18457913">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18457913">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18457913">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text of Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17115743">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17115743">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17115743">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Sources for Industry Research
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17115743">
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <strong>
             Communications Industry Forecast
            </strong>
            <br />
            Location: Most recent edition (2012) -- Ready Reference&nbsp; 302.230684 C734i
            <br />
            Location: Previous edition (2008) -- Ready Reference 302.230684 C734i
            <br />
            Location: Previous edtion (2005) -- Ready Reference 302.230684 C734i
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             Encyclopedia of American Industries
             <br />
            </strong>
            Location:
            <a href="http://0-find.galegroup.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/3TNK">
             Online
            </a>
            (or search the library catalog by title to access)
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17115743" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17115745">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17115745">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17115745">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Other Industry Research: Company Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17115745">
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bsh">
             Business Source Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            <em>
             Online via Library Homepage -- Databases A to Z
            </em>
            <br />
            To access company profiles, use the Company Profiles tab at the top of the screen.
           </p>
           <p>
            <strong>
             Business Rankings Annual
            </strong>
            <br />
            Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 338.74 B979r
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-www.lexisnexis.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/us/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            <em>
             Online via Library Homepage --
            </em>
            <em>
             Databases A to Z
            </em>
            <br />
            To research particular companies, use the Get Company Info box.&nbsp;
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17115745" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18457917">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18457917">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18457917">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18457468">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.&nbsp;
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             APA Style
            </strong>
            , see:
            <ul>
             <li>
              <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/library/media/content,assets/library/docs/apa_example.pdf">
               APA Style
              </a>
              (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
              <br />
              Examples of in-text and reference list citation formatting.
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/section/2/10/">
               APA Style
              </a>
              (Purdue Online Writing Lab)
              <br />
              General orientation to APA Style, plus examples of paper and citation formatting.
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://writing.wisc.edu/Handbook/DocAPA.html">
               APA Documentation Guide
              </a>
              (University of Wisconsin)
              <br />
              General orientation to APA Style, plus examples of paper and citation formatting.
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
            </a>
            <br />
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt18457468" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4651912" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18457921">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18457921">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18457921">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
